member.name: M:ALAZ.SystemEx.BaseDisposable.Free(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is called when object is being disposed. Override this method to free resources.
member.param: Indicates if the method can access Finalizable member objects. If canAccessFinalizable = false the method was called by GC and you canÂ´t access finalizable member objects. If canAccessFinalizable = true the method was called by user and you can access all member objects.

member.name: M:ALAZ.SystemEx.BaseDisposable.CheckDisposedWithException
member.summary: Checks if object is already disposed.

member.name: P:ALAZ.SystemEx.BaseDisposable.Disposed
member.summary: Indicates is object is already disposed.
